CustomField.formula: CASE(MOD(DATEVALUE(Ophalen_vanaf_voorstel__c) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, "zondag", 1, "maandag", 2, "dinsdag", 3, "woensdag", 4, "donderdag", 5, "vrijdag", 6, "zaterdag", "" ) & " " & TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(Ophalen_vanaf_voorstel__c))) & " " & CASE(MONTH(DATEVALUE(Ophalen_vanaf_voorstel__c)), 1, "januari", 2, "februari", 3, "maart", 4, "april", 5, "mei", 6, "juni", 7, "juli", 8, "augustus", 9, "september", 10, "oktober", 11, "november", 12, "december", "" ) & " " & TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Ophalen_vanaf_voorstel__c))) & " tussen " & TEXT(VALUE(LEFT(MID(TEXT(Ophalen_vanaf_voorstel__c), 12, 2), 2)) + 1) & ":" & MID(TEXT(Ophalen_vanaf_voorstel__c), 15, 2) & " uur en " & TEXT(VALUE(LEFT(MID(TEXT(Ophalen_tot_voorstel__c), 12, 2), 2)) + 1) & ":" & MID(TEXT(Ophalen_tot_voorstel__c), 15, 2) & " uur."
CustomField.label: Ophaalvoorstel formula
